full_summary:
=====================================

## Solicitation for the Acquisition of Windows for Vessel Martha L. Black

### Reference Number
WS3873756668-Doc3874004159

### Solicitation Number
WS3873756668

### Publication Date
2023-02-27

### Tender Closing Date and Time
2023-03-20T14:00:00 (April 20, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT)

### Notice Type
Request for Proposal

### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding

### End User Entity Name
Departement of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)

### End User Entity Address
200 Kent Street, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0E6, Canada

### Contracting Entity Name
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Contracting Entity Address
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact Information
Parent, Melanie (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [melanie.parent@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:melanie.parent@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Notice URL
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15430809?extsite=MTU0MzA4MDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Description of the Solicitation
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO), is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of 6 new windows to be installed in the wheelhouse of the vessel Martha L. Black. The scope of work includes the design, supply, delivery, and installation of the windows at the specified location. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the tender closing date. 

The Request for Proposal (RFP) document, including all annexes and amendments, is available on the Government of Canada's Buy andSell website at the notice URL provided above. 

### Closing Notes
The tender is set to expire on March 20, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT. Late bids will not be considered. 

Gaspard Strailerie  
Legal Review and Approval Coordinator, PSPC  
(###) XXX-XXXX
